summary: This is an email chain from January 4, 2021, forwarding a request from the incoming administration's transition team for a list of significant, publicly filed cases from the Executive Office for U.S. Attorneys. It includes an attachment with case write-ups and instructions for submission.

persons.name: Paralega
persons.context: Recipient designated to receive information about significant cases from FAUSAs, Criminal Chiefs, and Civil Chiefs for the transition team request.

events.title: Deadline for Case Information Submission
events.description: Deadline for FAUSAs, Criminal Chiefs, and Civil Chiefs to send information about their top two criminal cases and one civil case to EOUSA paralegal for the transition team request.

events.title: Transition Team Request Issued
events.description: EOUSA receives a request from the incoming administration's transition team for a list of pending, significant cases on public dockets.

keyFacts: The incoming administration's transition team requested a list of significant, publicly filed cases from the Executive Office for U.S. Attorneys.
The request asked for the top two criminal cases and one civil case from each district, to be submitted by January 5, 2021.
The document includes an attachment named 'Publicly_Filed_SDNY_Cases_for_Transition.docx' which contains case write-ups.
The email chain shows internal DOJ coordination for responding to a political transition request.
